aggregation_functions.query: avg by(container,namespace,workload,workload_type,owner_kind) ((kube_pod_container_resource_requests{container!="", container!="POD", pod!="", resource="cpu", unit="core", container="$CONTAINER_NAME$", namespace="$NAMESPACE$"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left max by (container,pod, namespace) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) * on(pod) group_left(workload, workload_type) max by (pod, workload, workload_type) (max_over_time(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{pod!="",workload="$WORKLOAD$", workload_type="$WORKLOAD_TYPE$"}[15m])) * on(pod) group_left(owner_kind) max by (pod, owner_kind) (max_over_time(kube_pod_owner{pod!=""}[15m]))))
